item.title: Axiom #1
item.description: Principles are important because they can make hard decisions easier. So they are useful from an efficiency standpoint. They can also serve to lower the chances of catastrophic mistakes. If you draft your principles when your mind is at rest, what you come up with will likely help protect you from emotional impulses when you are in a more tumultuous frame of mind. However I don’t think that principles are the foundation.
